material = openmoc.Material()
with self.assertRaises(Exception):
    material.getSigmaS()
with self.assertRaises(Exception):
    material.getSigmaA()
with self.assertRaises(Exception):
    material.getSigmaT()
with self.assertRaises(Exception):
    material.getSigmaF()
with self.assertRaises(Exception):
    material.getNuSigmaF()
